strapiPost.title: Wellington's Prepares To Open Rogers Location
strapiPost.content:
The folks behind Wellington's are hard at work to get their Rogers location opened at ONE Uptown.

  • Classic lounge: Founded in Springdale, Wellington's is an upscale casual restaurant offering a premium selection of cocktails, elegantly curated cuisine, and a prestigious cigar lounge, The Reserve.
  • Uptown: Adding a north option to this locally owned and operated restaurant, Wellington's is making final touches to its Rogers location near Pinnacle Hills and hopes to open very soon.

Follow Wellington's on Instagram to stay up to date on opening events HERE.
